body:
Declare @UTSiparisDID INT
Declare cSiparisKapat Cursor Local For
Select   DISTINCT  USD.UTSiparisDID          
From        IT15_LogsITObjects LIO
Inner Join IT04_SiparisD SD On LIO.KeyFieldValue = SD.SiparisDetayID
Inner Join IT06_Stoklar S On S.UrunTID = SD.UrunTID
Left Outer Join IT04_UTSiparisD USD On USD.UTSiparisDID = SD.UTSiparisDID
Left Outer Join IT04_UTSiparisM USM On USM.UTSiparisID = USD.UTSiparisID
Left Outer Join IT01_Personel P On P.PersonelID = USM.SiparisiAlan
Left Outer Join IT01_Firmalar F On F.FirmaID = USM.FirmaID
Left Outer Join IT01_UTSiparisDurumlari USDD On USDD.UTSiparisDurumID = USD.UTSiparisDurumID
Where       LIO.ITVeriIslemID = 13690 And   LIO.DSITobjectID = 25692 And USD.UTSiparisDurumID = 400 And SD.SiparisDetayDurumu = 4 And USM.SiparisiAlan In (66,68)
Open cSiparisKapat
Fetch Next From cSiparisKapat Into @UTSiparisDID
While @@FETCH_STATUS=0 Begin
    
    Exec dbo.PSP04_UTSiparisKapat @UTSiparisDID = @UTSiparisDID
    




    Fetch Next From cSiparisKapat Into @UTSiparisDID
End
Close cSiparisKapat
Deallocate cSiparisKapat
